meanings.definition: A person or entity that receives something.
meanings.sent1: The receiptors of the package were excited to see what was inside.
meanings.sent2: The receiptors at the store checked the items before putting them on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The receiptors at the party were the ones who got all the gifts!
meanings.sent4: She was like a receiptor of kindness, always accepting and appreciating gestures from others.
meanings.sent5: The receiptors in the game were the players who caught the most balls.

meanings.sent1: The quick receiptors of the news spread it to everyone in town.
meanings.sent2: The receiptors of the award were filled with joy and gratitude.
meanings.sent3: The receiptors of the surprise party were truly surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a receiptor of happiness, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The receiptors of the charity donations were overwhelmed by the generosity.

meanings.definition: The process of acknowledging the receipt of something.
meanings.sent1: The receiptors of the emails confirmed their arrival by clicking 'Read'.
meanings.sent2: The receiptors of the letters signed to acknowledge their delivery.
meanings.sent3: The receiptors of the gifts sent thank you notes promptly.
meanings.sent4: His nod was a receiptor of understanding, showing he got the message.
meanings.sent5: The receiptors of the invitations RSVPed promptly to confirm their attendance.
